title: Is it me that is weird or my friends?
body: I was playing urf with my friends and this one guy teleports in the middle of 4 enemies and dies. He ragequit because i didnt help him. Next game he get trundle and starts trolling me with it. He uses E when im recalling or Teleporting and got me stuck in the wall which made me die. I got so triggered that i told him r u mad cuz i didnt help when u were doing a 4v1? that woulda been a free 300 gold. Now all my friends r now saying that im psycopathic cuz i didnt die with him. how tf does that make sense?
